attributes.action: Fund and support our performing arts theatres.
attributes.additional_details: Without funding there are warnings that 70% of theatres will run out of money by the end of this year. The Nuffield in Southampton have already gone bust along with others. Sonia Friedman who is a West End producer said performing arts face "the real possibility of complete obliteration" without substantial government support. The Scottish government have announced a £10 million fund to support performing arts venues. We need to show the same support for our performing arts venues.
attributes.background: Help to fund and bring forward the re-opening of theatres. Theatre is a place to be celebrated. It brings joy to so many people's lives. I grew up watching and performing in theatres and I think it would be a huge loss if this art wasn't able to continue due to lack of support.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711
